channel.title: S3 on Francesco Farina
channel.description: Recent content in S3 on Francesco Farina

item.title: s3stream
item.description: Setup import "github.com/indiependente/s3stream" // where conf is &aws.Config store := s3stream.NewStoreWithClient(s3.New(session.Must(session.NewSession(conf)))) Get rc, err := store.Get(prefix, bucketname, filename) Put n, err := store.Put(prefix, bucketname, filename, contentType, r)
